short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple chrome extension for saving your online resources to recurso.tech.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple chrome extension for saving resources to recurso.tech
1. add a topic
2. update the description (if you want)
3. save it!

That's it, Your resource is sharable with qr code, categorized and searchable for the next time you need it!
Now you can close the million tabs you have open and start using your resources!
